tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    permissions JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE permissions (
  permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  platform_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  can_trade BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_permissions (
    user_id INT,
    permission_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (permission_id) REFERENCES permissions(permission_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, permission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE account_permissions (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    exchange_id INT NOT NULL,
    permission_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_accounts(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (exchange_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_exchange(exchange_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT NOT NULL,
    trade_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    trade_amount DECIMAL(18, 8) NOT NULL,
    trade_currency VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES account_permissions(account_id)
);
